Items.Title: AMD's Bold ARM Server Gambit
Items.Subtitle: AMD's Bold ARM Server Gambit
Items.Description: By combining 64-bit ARM processors with server-side technology, the company that led the x86 architecture into the 64-bit world is hoping to reinvent the data center and give itself new life.
